# Create Reusable SourcesList Component

## ðŸŸ¡ Medium Priority

### Summary
Source citation display duplicated in question-editor and multi-step-dialog.

### Implementation
```typescript
// components/sources-list.tsx
interface SourcesListProps {
  sources: Source[];
  onSourceClick?: (source: Source) => void;
  variant?: 'compact' | 'expanded';
}

export function SourcesList({ sources, onSourceClick, variant = 'compact' }: SourcesListProps) {
  return (
    <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
      {sources.map((source) => (
        <Button
          key={source.id}
          variant="outline"
          size="sm"
          onClick={() => onSourceClick?.(source)}
        >
          {source.fileName}
          {source.pageNumber && ` (p.${source.pageNumber})`}
        </Button>
      ))}
    </div>
  );
}
```

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create SourcesList component
- [ ] Support compact/expanded views
- [ ] Handle click interactions
- [ ] Replace duplicate markup

### Estimated Effort
2-3 hours
